item.title: The Legal Protection of Artistic Expression as Therapy: A Case for Patient-Client Confidentiality in Art and Music
item.description: Exploring the intersection of artistic expression, trauma healing, and legal protections, this article argues for extending patient-client confidentiality principles to artists, safeguarding their therapeutic freedom of speech.
